name: Grove Climbers
description:
The grove is in danger, and only you can save it!

You must climb the sacred tree to clear out the pests that are infesting its trunk.  It's a long way up, and your team need to stay roped together to have any hope of survival.
Recruit new adventurers and equip weapons and charms that let you fight as a powerful team.  Battle mites, locusts, moths, and other deadly pests.  And prepare yourself for what lurks at the top of the tree!

  • Game design, programming, graphics: sprvrn
  • Music, sound effects, graphics and title screen: Nyeti

Programmed in löve2d, sound produced in PICO-8, and graphics made in Aseprite using the Matriax8c palette. Fonts Pocket, Eighties and Theoretical by somepx.

Made in 7 days for 7DRL Challenge 2022

Controls

Arrow keys: Move lead climber, attack
X: Switch lead climber
M: Equipment menu
H: Help
